name: Prescribing of more than one adrenaline auto-injector
title: Prescribing of more than one adrenaline auto-injector
description: The percentage of prescriptions for a single adrenaline auto-injector as a proportion of all prescriptions for adrenaline auto-injector.
numerator_short: Number of prescriptions for a single adrenaline auto-injector
why_it_matters: The MHRA remind patients at risk of anaphlaxis to to carry two in-date adrenaline auto-injectors with them at all times and to replace them before they expire

This is in case a second dose is needed whilst waiting for the emergency services. Patients do not have to be dispensed two auto-injectors, as there will always be occasions when only one auto-injector is required such as, when one pen is lost or one has expired but the other is still in date.
By dispensing more than one auto-injector at a time may help to ensure that they have two adrenaline auto-injectors ready.
numerator_where: bnf_code LIKE '0304030C0%' AND quantity_per_item = 1 --Adrenaline auto-injectors (brands and generic)
